project.name: ha-cluster
project.author: Tomáš Chvátal
project.description: The HA Cluster team manages high availibility cluster implementations in portage tree.

longdescription.p: The HA Cluster team manages the ha-cluster implementations and base-level accessories in Portage. This includes heartbeat, corosync, pacemaker as well as other core libraries and accessories.

goals.p: The team aims to support HA Clustering with ensight of stability and reliabilty on its mind. With hope of fresh and stable ebuilds and descriptive and easy configuration availible for them.

body.p: If you want to get involved with improving Gentoo's clustering experience, we'd like to hear from you! The main thing you'll want to do is be active on Gentoo's Bugzilla. Also please join cluster project members in #gentoo-cluster on irc.freenode.net.
